description: React hook for managing task list with API interactions, including CRUD operations and task toggling.

methods.name: useTasks()
methods.description: Main hook managing tasks state, integrating API calls for task list, create, update, delete, and toggle actions.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetch latest tasks from the API and update local state.

methods.name: createTask
methods.description: Create a new task via API and update local state.

methods.name: updateTask
methods.description: Update existing task via API and update local state.

methods.name: deleteTask
methods.description: Delete a task via API and update local state.

methods.name: toggleStatus
methods.description: Toggle task status via API and update local state.
